testcase.name: Verify the h1 tag in all pages
testcase.system-out: Given User is on StoreFront homepage with https://uat.buy.hpe.com/ca/fr.....passed Then H1 tag is present......................................................passed When User goes to login page................................................passed And User logins with cnfrfer11@yopmail.com and cnfrfer11....................passed Then H1 tag is present......................................................passed When User goes to Servers Catalog...........................................passed Then H1 tag is present......................................................passed And User searches for "DL380"...............................................passed Then H1 tag is present......................................................passed And User searches and opens "DL380".........................................passed Then H1 tag is present......................................................passed And User clicks on get quote button.........................................passed Then H1 tag is present......................................................passed When User completes the quote request form..................................passed Then H1 tag is present......................................................passed
